responses.rationale: The segment reports on past events ('tested positive') and current understanding ('thought to be spreading') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes the cause of a current state ('driven by the discovery') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment provides advice ('advises that... should be cooked') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event ('was detected') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes the current state ('intensifies an ongoing outbreak') and a past event ('follows the destruction') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports on past events ('were at') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports on past events ('have been detected') and speculates about a future negative impact ('posing a likely threat') but not about relief or improvement.
The segment describes the current state ('seeing more geographic spread') compared to the past but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes the mechanism of infection ('usually occurs as a result of') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event ('detected the presence') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes the mechanism of infection ('can happen when') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes an update to an article ('were updated to clarify') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports on past events ('said the cases were found') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment describes the spread mechanism and timing ('is spread by... usually this time of year') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event ('have become infected') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
The segment reports a past event ('has infected') but does not speculate about future relief or improvement.
